name: Hidden Object Mystic Castle - Misterious Story Gold Version Free
name_original: Hidden Object Mystic Castle - Misterious Story Gold Version Free
description:
Some mysterious stories are told about an ancient castle as if very long time ago the owners have disappeared for unknown reasons, and since then no one lives in it. But even more strange is that those who enter it - disappear without a trace as well. We need to investigate this place and all around the castle. There must be a reason for this and it is possible mystical power is involved in it. They say the butler has been interested in magic. It is most likely that he has found an ancient curse and cursed the
castle. It is necessary to solve the mystery hidden for years!

FEATURES:
- 20 Hidden Object Levels and Bonus Levels
- Addictive atmosphere of the game
- A huge map of the world
- Unique mini-games
- Beautiful scenes
